title: Salvage
summary: Salvage is an item type obtainable through destroying ships or looting derelicts. They can be sold, refined into more functional materials at a random rate, used in crafting recipes, or be turned into factions for standing, depending on the item.
full_text:
Salvage
Salvage is an item type obtainable through destroying ships or looting derelicts. They can be sold, refined into more functional materials at a random rate, used in crafting recipes, or be turned into factions for standing, depending on the item.
Salvage is found in two forms: Junk, salvaged from wrecks, and Standing Items, items that drop from NPC ships.
The ease of obtaining these items is based on their item rarity. For a comprehensive guide on how to determine item rarity, visit the classification page.
Junk
Name
Icon
Size (m3)
Description
Function
Obtained from:
Scrap Metal
0.01
Metal scraps from the wreck of a spaceship.
Refines into a random material, not including Water or Vexnium
Most NPC Ships
Power Cell
0.1
Intact power cell used to provide energy to a spaceship.
Crafting Ingredient
Most NPC Ships

The core from the wreck of a drone. This item can be turned in to a CoreSec officer for faction standing.

Description

0.01
A mysterious crystalline shard.
Trophy*
Crystalline Guardian
Ancient Drone Core
1
The core from the wreck of an automated drone of the distant past. Analysis suggests the specimen this core was procured from was idle for over a thousand years.
Trophy
Ancient Drone
*Crystal Shards were eventually™ going to be used to make Tesla turrets, which mimic the lightning capabilities of Crystalline Guardians. This is unlikely to happen because of development on the game being stagnant.

content_structure.title: Salvage
content_structure.content:
Salvage is an item type obtainable through destroying ships or looting derelicts. They can be sold, refined into more functional materials at a random rate, used in crafting recipes, or be turned into factions for standing, depending on the item.
Salvage is found in two forms: Junk, salvaged from wrecks, and Standing Items, items that drop from NPC ships.
The ease of obtaining these items is based on their item rarity. For a comprehensive guide on how to determine item rarity, visit the classification page.
